dict.acceptation: 把…堆成小山；培土于…周围；

sent.orig: James lived on a hill. So people began to call him James Hill.
sent.trans: 詹姆斯(james)住在一座小山，所以人们就叫他詹姆斯？西尔(Hill的音译，意思是“小山”)。

sent.orig: The experimental data have been treated with Hill-de Boer equation.
sent.trans: 用Hill-de Boer方程处理了实验结果。

sent.orig: The noted ones are East Dongting Hill, West Hill, Maji Hill, Sanshan Hill and Yuantouzhu.
sent.trans: 以洞庭东山、西山、马迹山、三山、元头诸最为著名。

sent.orig: Mud of cent black hill and yellow hill mud two kinds.
sent.trans: 分黑山泥和黄山泥两种。

sent.orig: 'Coming up the hill, and at the top of the hill, both?'
sent.trans: “是在上坡的时候和在山坡顶上么？”
